sentences.en: "Well," I said, grinding my cigarette nervously into the granite step.
sentences.cn: “好吧，”我边说边紧张不安地把香烟在花岗岩台阶上捻灭。

sentences.en: Banning cigarette advertising would be unconstitutional, since selling cigarettes is legal.
sentences.cn: 既然出售香烟是合法的，那么禁止做香烟广告就是违宪的。

sentences.en: Britain's health experts are pushing for a ban on all cigarette advertising.
sentences.cn: 英国的健康专家正努力争取取缔任何形式的香烟广告。

sentences.en: Halfway down the cigarette she had a fit of coughing.
sentences.cn: 烟抽到一半，她突然一阵猛咳。

sentences.en: He fumbled his one-handed attempt to light his cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他笨拙地想用一只手点燃香烟。

sentences.en: He lit a cigarette and perched on the corner of the desk.
sentences.cn: 他点了一根烟，坐在桌角上。

sentences.en: He lit a half-cigarette and almost immediately put it out again.
sentences.cn: 他点燃半支香烟，但又马上把它熄灭了。

sentences.en: He reached for a cigarette and lit it, fingers rock steady.
sentences.cn: 他伸手拿了一支烟点着，手指纹丝不动。

sentences.en: He took a deep pull of his cigarette and exhaled the smoke.
sentences.cn: 他深吸了一口烟，然后轻轻吐了出来。

sentences.en: He took a drag on his cigarette, and exhaled the smoke.
sentences.cn: 他吸了一口烟，吐出了烟雾。

sentences.en: Newman poured more black coffee and lit a cigarette.
sentences.cn: 纽曼又倒了些黑咖啡，接着点了支烟。

sentences.en: Richard lit another cigarette and puffed smoke towards the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 理查德又点了一支烟，朝着天花板喷云吐雾。

sentences.en: Somehow she steadied herself and murmured, "Have you got a cigarette?"
sentences.cn: 她设法让自己镇定下来，并小声问：“你有烟吗？”

sentences.en: The product looks and burns like a regular cigarette.
sentences.cn: 这种产品看起来和点燃后都与常见的香烟没什么两样。

sentences.en: When they reached his house, Scobie idled a bit, finishing his cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他们到他家后，斯科比闲逛了一会儿，抽完了他的香烟。

trans.tran_en: a thin tube of paper filled with finely cut tobacco that people smoke
